channel.title: Web Design on Francis Laguna-Driscoll - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Web Design on Francis Laguna-Driscoll - Portfolio

item.title: Home Living Mock Up
item.description: This is a personal project I worked on in order to practice the open-composition design trend I recently read about on 99designs.com. My goal here was to create a mock-up for a home goods website. First, I sketched a product component to be used across the website. I then integrated the component into three different templates: a landing page, a product page and a shop page. I mocked-up a quick and simple word mark for the brand and picked a secondary typography from Google web fonts.

item.title: WAM Partners Website Proposal
item.description: WORDPRESS THEME During my time at WAM Partners I was able to work on a side project that involved the company. I was able to create a website using WordPress with a custom theme using Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) in the back end, and then using Bootstrap for the front end. So the initial problem I had run into while working at WAM Partners was having to update their website.
